name: Furio
public_notice:
The smart contract is not verified for the following asset, which means the owners may be able to modify contract behaviour (for example: disable selling, change fees, mint new tokens, or transfer tokens).
Please proceed with caution.
additional_notices: Kindly be aware of liquidity-related risks. This notice is not directed at any project in particular, and is more of a cautionary reminder.

description.en:
Furio offers a deflationary up to 2.5% daily ROI system. Paired with USDC for stability.

Participants can compound their daily rewards to achieve optimal results, claim up to 2.5% a day from day 1 of depositing, and earn bonuses by creating teams that offers rewards in a round robin system.
